mapper.select: select o.orders_no, o.order_date, p.product_name, od.detail_price, od.detail_qty, o.order_tot, op.pay_price, op.pay_method, o.pay_state, i.image_name,p.product_no,om.order_state from orders o,order_detail od,products p, order_pay op,product_img i,order_manage om where o.orders_no=od.orders_no and od.product_no=p.product_no and om.orders_no=o.orders_no and o.orders_no=op.orders_no and p.product_no=i.product_no and i.thumbnail=1 and o.user_no=#{userNo} order by o.orders_no desc

select basket_no, product_name,product_price,basket_qty,image_name, p.product_no,product_price*basket_qty detail_price from products p, product_basket pb,product_img pi where p.product_no = pb.product_no and p.product_no=pi.product_no and pi.thumbnail=1 and pb.user_no =#{userNo} order by basket_no desc
mapper.delete: delete product_basket where user_no=#{userNo} and basket_no=#{basketNo}
mapper.update: update order_manage set order_state=1,order_manage_reason=#{orderManageReason} where orders_no=(select o.orders_no from order_detail od,orders o where o.orders_no=od.orders_no and user_no=#{userNo} and product_no=#{productNo})
mapper.select: select zzim_no, product_name,product_price,image_name,p.product_no from products p, product_zzim pz,product_img pi where p.product_no = pz.product_no and p.product_no=pi.product_no and pi.thumbnail=1 and pz.user_no =#{userNo} order by zzim_no desc

select o.orders_no, review_no,review_title,review_content,review_evaluation,review_date,review_img, p.product_no,p.product_name,pi.image_name,od.detail_qty,op.pay_price from review r, orders o, order_detail od, product_img pi, products p, order_pay op where o.orders_no=r.orders_no and r.orders_no=od.orders_no and od.product_no=pi.product_no and op.orders_no=od.orders_no and p.product_no=pi.product_no and user_no=#{userNo} and pi.thumbnail=1 order by review_no desc
select * from users u,user_address ud where u.user_no=ud.user_no and u.user_no=#{userNo}
